title: Tusk Johnson Mountain Man
description: Way more than a guy wandering around in the woods. Tusk Johnson was a legend, unmatched in the Alaskan arts.
quote: He never met a beast that he couldn’t tame!
altHero: Tusk Johnson grabbing a bear by the neck
alt1: shirtless Tusk looking around at the top of a tall tree
alt2: an eagle lands on Tusk’s arm
alt3: Tusk paddling a log down a river
alt4: Tusk carrying a bunch of fish
